column2: Fowlkes Mine, Panther Creek, Miss.; Wards P/N: 46E 0435 (33º 45' 09.29"N 155º 28' 19.54"W)

Purchased from Wards Natural Sciences. NOTE: Wards description of Panther Creek Colorodo is INCORRECT. This desposit of montmorillonite is actually from the Fowlkes Mine in Panther Creek COUNTY, Miss.  GPS coordinates estimated from Google Earth. Bulk sample, no sorting.
